com.vedantatree.redmineconnector
Class JIBXXMLJavaConvertor

java.lang.Object
  com.vedantatree.redmineconnector.JIBXXMLJavaConvertor

public class JIBXXMLJavaConvertor
extends java.lang.Object

This object is used to convert the Java Object to XML format and vice versa. For implementation, it is using JIBX library. The mapping for conversion can be found in 'binding.xml' file

Author:
Mohit Gupta [mohit.gupta@vedantatree.com]

Method Detail

getIssueFromXML

public Issue getIssueFromXML(java.lang.String XML)
                      throws RCException
This method converts the specified XML to Issue object. It is assumed that specified XML will be for Issue Object only, otherwise there will be an exception.

Parameters:
XML - It is the XML representation of Issue Object
Returns:
Converted Issue Object
Throws:
RCException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion

getIssuesFromXML

public java.util.List<Issue> getIssuesFromXML(java.lang.String XML)
                                       throws RCException
This method converts the specified XML to List of Issue objects. It is assumed that specified XML will be for Issue Objects only, otherwise there will be an exception.

Parameters:
XML - It is the XML representation of collection of Issue Object
Returns:
List of converted Issue Object
Throws:
RCException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion

                                           throws RCException

xmlToJava

public java.lang.Object xmlToJava(java.lang.String XML,
                                  java.lang.Class clazz)
                           throws RCException
This method converts the given XML to object of specified class.

Parameters:
XML - It is the XML representation of object/s
clazz - Type of object/s
Returns:
Converted Object/s from XML
Throws:
RCException - Throw Exception if there is any problem during conversion

javaToXML

public java.lang.String javaToXML(java.lang.Object javaObject)
                           throws RCException
This method converts the given Java object to corresponding XML format. The format has been specified with binding.xml file.

Parameters:
javaObject - It is the Object to convert to XML
Returns:
Object in XML format
Throws:
RCException - Throw Exception if there is any problem during conversion

issueXMLToCreateIssue

public java.lang.String issueXMLToCreateIssue(Issue issue)
This method creates the XML representation for Issue Object. We need to write a separate method from JavaToXML because Redmine accepts a different format for Issue XML while creating/updating the Object. We shall create a separate mapping for this case later.

Parameters:
issue - Issue Object to convert to XML format
Returns:
XML representation of specified issue object

serializeFloat

public static java.lang.String serializeFloat(java.lang.Float floatValue)
                                       throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
This method is used by JIBX to serialize the float value. A custom implementation has been provided to handle the case of null object.

Parameters:
floatValue - float value to serialize
Returns:
String representation of float value
Throws:
org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion

deserializeFloat

public static java.lang.Float deserializeFloat(java.lang.String text)
                                        throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
This method is used by JIBX to de-serialize the float value. A custom implementation has been provided to handle the case of null object or empty string.

Parameters:
text - float value to de-serialize
Returns:
Float converted float value
Throws:
org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion

serializeDate

public static java.lang.String serializeDate(java.util.Date dateValue)
                                      throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
This method is used by JIBX to serialize the date type value. A custom implementation has been provided to handle the case of null object.

Parameters:
dateValue - date value to serialize
Returns:
String representation of date value
Throws:
org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion

deserializeDate

public static java.util.Date deserializeDate(java.lang.String text)
                                      throws org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException
This method is used by JIBX to de-serialize the date value. A custom implementation has been provided to handle the case of null object or empty string and to handle the special date format sent by Redmine.

Parameters:
text - date value to de-serialize
Returns:
Date converted Date value
Throws:
org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException - Throws error if there is any problem during conversion
